title: civil control
description: Anyone who renounces responsibility also renounces the decision
description_hu: Aki lemond a felelősségről, az lemond a döntésről is.
description_full: Politics, just like corporations, have their own perspectives. Politics must be kept away from breaking with humanity, generosity and responsibility — the big words. This webring is a curated list of civil movements who work for similar objectives. “Thou shalt not be indifferent.”
